mapper.select: SELECT pw FROM t2_member WHERE id=#{param1} AND PW=#{param2}
SELECT diary_number, diary_subject, diary_reg_date FROM t2_diary WHERE id=#{param1} ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(diary_number) DESC

SELECT r.dest_num,r.review_content,r.id,r.review_reg_data,ra.rating, d.dest_name FROM t2_review r INNER JOIN t2_rating ra ON r.dest_num = ra.dest_num INNER JOIN t2_dest d ON ra.dest_num = d.dest_num and r.id = ra.id WHERE r.id=#{param1} ORDER BY r.review_reg_data DESC

SELECT dr.reply_content, dr.reply_reg_date, dr.diary_number, d.diary_subject FROM t2_diary_reply dr INNER JOIN t2_diary d ON dr.diary_number = d.diary_number WHERE dr.id = #{param1} ORDER BY dr.reply_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T2_DEL_MEMBER (deleted_num, id, deleted_date, reason) VALUES (t2_deleted_num_seq.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, SYSDATE, #{param2})
mapper.select: SELECT ask_num, ask_subject, ask_reg_date FROM t2_ASK WHERE id=#{param1} ORDER BY ask_num DESC
